input: An art deco bathroom with geometric tile patterns, a pedestal bathtub, a vintage vanity, and golden light fixtures without any rugs.
edit: Add a black and white geometric patterned rug in the center of the room.
output: An art deco bathroom with geometric tile patterns, a pedestal bathtub, a vintage vanity, and golden light fixtures with a black and white geometric patterned rug in the center of the room.
